arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold's new life at Real Madrid as he makes Anfield return: His inner circle in Spain, the Liverpool team-mates who haven't stayed in touch and how he keeps himself busy off the pitch
arts.sum: On Tuesday night, Anfield will host 22 of the greatest footballers from all corners of God's green earth. But before this showpiece, the attention is on a lad from just round the corner.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Real Madrid: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The Reds host the La Liga leaders in a blockbuster Champions League duel.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Pre-Match Press Conference Ahead of Real Madrid vs Liverpool in the UCL
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Xabi Alonso will face one of his old teams, which he represented as a player, as Real Madrid take on Liverpool in Matchday 4 of the Champions League. Alonso spoke to the media ahead of the game against Liverpool at Anfield.

arts.ttl: ‘Amazing, exceptional’ – Liverpool boss Slot praises Real Madrid star

arts.ttl: Watch: Xabi Alonso & Alexander-Arnold lead Real Madrid tribute to Liverpool’s Diogo Jota
arts.sum: La Liga giants Real Madrid on Monday made use of the opportunity to pay their respects to former Liverpool star Diogo Jota. After arriving in England ahead of tomorrow night’s…

arts.ttl: Fresh injury blow leaves Real Madrid without four players for Liverpool battle
arts.sum: Real Madrid suffer a fresh injury blow ahead of Tuesday's Champions League game against Liverpool, with summer arrival Franco Mastantuono ruled out of the contest.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sends emotional Diogo Jota message before Liverpool vs Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: The former Liverpool right-back has paid tribute to Diogo Jota outside of Anfield on Monday evening

arts.ttl: Three talking points ahead of Liverpool vs Real Madrid | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Real Madrid are currently one of the most in-form teams in Europe and appear to have it in them to breeze past any side in the top-five leagues. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso says he has ‘no doubts’ Florian Wirtz can succeed at Liverpool
arts.sum: The Real Madrid manager said Wirtz is ‘probably one of the reasons I’m here now’ as he expressed his gratitude for his former star player

arts.ttl: Alonso talks Mbappe, Vinicius, Wirtz, Anfield return ahead of Liverpool vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: One of the biggest matches of the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League group stage comes our way tomorrow as record champions Real Madrid take on Premier League title-holders Liverpool at Anfield.
